D. D. Raju Coolie is a wealthy businessman.

In the movie 'Coolie No. 1' (2020), which of the following statements are true regarding the relationship between Sarah Rozario and Jeffrey?
Options:
A. A) Jeffrey insults Jai Kishen when he learns the family isn't wealthy.
B. B) Jai Kishen helps Raju get married to Sarah to take revenge.
C. C) Sarah is unaware of her father's financial expectations.
D. D) Raju is a wealthy character in the film.
Correct Answer: A) Jeffrey insults Jai Kishen when he learns the family isn't wealthy., B) Jai Kishen helps Raju get married to Sarah to take revenge.
